S06adhsatpu:1: namo namaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ // namo bhagavatyā āryaprajñāpāramitāyai //
S06adhsatpu:2_0: AśP 1. evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān sarvatathāgatavajrādhiṣṭhānasamayajñānavividhaviśeṣasamanvāgataḥ
S06adhsatpu:12: AśP 3. evaṃ pramukhābhir aṣṭābhir bodhisattvakoṭībhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S06adhsatpu:13: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanam kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ sarvadharmaviśuddhimukhaṃ brahmacaryam saṃprakāśayati sma //
S06adhsatpu:16: tadyathā (1) surataviśuddhipadam etad yat uta bodhisattvapadam /
S06adhsatpu:38: tathā hi sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaviśuddhāḥ sarvadharmāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāviśuddhiteti //
S06adhsatpu:39_1: prajñāpāramitānayaṃ sakṛd api śroṣyati tasyā bodhimaṇḍāt sarvajñeyāvaraṇakleśāvaraṇakarmāvaraṇāni
S06adhsatpu:39_2: mahānty apy upacinvato na kadācid api narakādyapāyopapattir bhaviṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:40: pāpāni ca kṛtamātrāṇy aduḥkhataḥ kṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
S06adhsatpu:41: yaś ca dhārayiṣyati dine dine vācayiṣyati svādhyāyiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati sa ihaiva janmani sarvadharmasamatāvajrasamādhipratilambhāt sarvadharmeśvaro bhaviśyati /
S06adhsatpu:43: ṣoḍaśame mahābodhisattvajanmani tathāgatatvaṃ pratilapsyate vajradharatvaṃ ceti //
S06adhsatpu:44_0: AśP 6. atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatamahāyānābhisamayaḥ sarvamaṇḍalaḥ sakalavajradhātvagryasattvaḥ
S06adhsatpu:44_3: udyotayan prahasitavadanas tad ādyaṃ mahāvajram vāmagarvollālanatayā svahṛdyutkarṣaṇayogena
S06adhsatpu:46: AśP 7. atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ prajñāpāramitānayaṃ sarvatathāgatavajradharmatābhisaṃbodhinirhāraṃ nāma deśayati sma /
S06adhsatpu:51: AśP 8. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imāṃś caturo dharmavihārāñ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvapāpasamācāro 'pi sarvāpāyasamatikrānto bhaviṣyaty ā bodhimaṇḍāt* /
S06adhsatpu:53: AśP 9. athedam uktvā bhagavāñ jñānamuṣṭiparigraha idam evārthapadaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayan smitamukha idaṃ sarvadharmasamatāhṛdayam abhāṣata / vajra āḥ //
S06adhsatpu:54: AśP 10. atha bhagavān sarvaduṣṭavinayanaśākyamunis tathāgataḥ punar api sarvadharmasamatāvijayasaṅgrahaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānirhāram abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:59_0: AśP 11. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ prajñāpāramitānayaṃ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati
S06adhsatpu:59_1: bhāvayiṣyati tasya traidhātukopapannān api sarvasattvān prapātayato nāpāyagamanaṃ
S06adhsatpu:61_0: AśP 12. atha vajrapāṇir imam eva dharmatārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayaṃs trilokavijayavajrāṃ
S06adhsatpu:61_2: pratyālīḍhasthānastha idaṃ vajrahūṃkāraṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata / vajra hūṃ //
S06adhsatpu:62: AśP 13. atha bhagavān svabhāvaviśuddhadharmatāprāptas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ sarvadharmasamatāvalokiteśvarajñānamudraṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayārtham abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:67: AśP 14. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ nayaṃ śroṣyati dhārayisyati vācayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvarāgamadhyasthito 'pi padmam iva rāgadoṣair na malair āgantukair lepaṃ yāsyati /
S06adhsatpu:69_0: AśP 15. atha bhagavān avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam evārthapadaṃ bhūyasyā
S06adhsatpu:69_2: idaṃ sarvajagadviśvarūpapadmaṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata / hrīḥ //
S06adhsatpu:70: AśP 16. atha bhagavān sarvatraidhātukādhipatis tathāgataḥ punar api sarvatathāgatābhiṣekasambhavajñānagarbhaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayārtham abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:75_0: AśP 17. athākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prahasitavadano bhūtvā svaśirasi vajraratnābhiṣekamālām
S06adhsatpu:75_1: avabandhayann imam eva dharmatārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayann idaṃ sarvābhiṣekasamayaratnaṃ
S06adhsatpu:76_0: AśP 18. atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatajñānamudrāprāptaḥ sarvatathāgatamuṣṭidharaḥ sarvatathāgataḥ
S06adhsatpu:76_1: śāśvataḥ punar apīmaṃ sarvatathāgatajñānamudrādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ nāma prajñāparamitānayārtham abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:81_0: AśP 19. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imam dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyaty
S06adhsatpu:81_1: uddeksyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvasiddhīḥ sarvasaṃpattīḥ sarvajñānāni sarvakāryāṇi
S06adhsatpu:83_0: AśP 20. atha bhagavān vajramuṣṭir mahāsamayavajramudrāparigraha imam evārthaṃ bhūyasyā
S06adhsatpu:83_1: mātrayoddīpayan prahasitavadana idaṃ sarvadṛḍhavajramudrāsiddhisamayaṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata / aḥ //
S06adhsatpu:84: AśP 21. atha bhagavān sarvadharmasamatāprapañcas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ cakrākṣaraparivartaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayārtham abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:90: AśP 32. ...t* tatra mahāvajreśvara idaṃ tattvahṛdayam agāt* / oṃ vajranetrībhyaḥ svāhā //
S06adhsatpu:91_0: AśP 33. atha bhagavān anantāparyantaniṣṭhas tathāgato 'paryantāniṣṭhadharmā punar
S06adhsatpu:96: AśP 33*. vajra oṃ sarvadharmatāprapañco hili sarvadharmatā mili sarvānurāgiṇi svāhā //
S06adhsatpu:97_0: AśP 34. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyaty
S06adhsatpu:97_1: uddekṣyati pravartayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati tasyāniṣṭhāṃ buddhabodhisattvacaryāṃ gatvā
S06adhsatpu:99: oṃ bhagavann ārāt pāraṃ viśodhaya svāhā //
S06adhsatpu:101: AśP 35. atha sarvatathāgatāḥ samājam āgamyāsya dharmaparyāyasyāmogham apratihatāśusiddhyarthaṃ vajrapāṇaye sādhukāram adāt*
S06adhsatpu:102: sādhu sādhu mahāsattva sādhu sādhu mahāsukha /
S06adhsatpu:103: sādhu sādhu mahāyāna sādhu sādhu mahāmate // 1//
S06adhsatpu:107: adhṛṣṭāś cāghatavyāś ca sarvamārādibhis tu te // 3 //
S06adhsatpu:111: idam uktvā tu sarvāgrāḥ sarvabuddhāḥ sasauraghanāḥ /
S06adhsatpu:113_0: AśP 37. atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgataḥ sarvatathāgataguhyadharmatāprāptaḥ sarvadharmāprapañcaḥ
S06adhsatpu:128: tāvat sattvārtham atulaṃ śaktāḥ kartum anirvṛtāḥ // 6 // prajñāpāramitopāyajñānādhiṣṭhānavāsitāḥ /
S06adhsatpu:130: rāgādivinayo loka ā bhavāt pāpakṛt sadā /
S06adhsatpu:131: teṣāṃ viśodhanārthaṃ tu vinayanty ā bhavāt svayam // 8 //
S06adhsatpu:132: yathā padmaṃ suraktaṃ tu rāgadoṣair na lipyate /
S06adhsatpu:133: vāsadoṣair bhave nityaṃ na lipyante jagaddhitāḥ // 9 //
S06adhsatpu:137_0: AśP 39. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ paramādyam prajñāpāramitānayamukhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
S06adhsatpu:137_1: dine dine kālyam utthāyoccārayiṣyati śroṣyati vā sa sarvasukhasaumanasyalābhī mahāsukhavajrāmoghasamayasiddhim
S06adhsatpu:139: AśP 40. atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiṃ guhyakādhipatim āmantrayate sma /
S06adhsatpu:183: oṃ aṃ vaṃ hūṃ oṃ aḥ //
S06adhsatpu:190: AśP 42. nāyaṃ vajrapāṇe 'navaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ karṇapuṭe nipatiṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:191: nāpy anavaropitakuśalamūlaiḥ sattvaiḥ śakyo likhituṃ paṭhituṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum* /
S06adhsatpu:192: anyatra bahubuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlās te sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imaṃ prajñāpāramitānayamukham dharmaparyāyam antaśa ekākṣaram api śroṣyanti /
S06adhsatpu:194_1: satkṛtāni na gurukṛtāni na mānitāni na pūjitāni bhavanti tena na śakyo 'ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānayamukho
S06adhsatpu:195: tasmāc caityabhūtaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati yatrāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:196: vandanīyaś ca sa pudgalo bahukalpakoṭī bhaviṣyati yasyāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ kāyagato vā pustakagato vā bhaviṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:198: na cāsya māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyaṃ kariṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:199: catvāraś cāsya mahārājānaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā bhaviṣyanti rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye anyāś ca devatāḥ /
S06adhsatpu:202: samāsato yatra buddhakṣetre ākāṅkṣiṣyate tatra tatropapatsyate /
S06adhsatpu:204: api ca pradeśamātraṃ mayā kīrtitam iti //
S06adhsatpu:206: āttamanaso vajrapāṇipramukhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
